name: Cake Pop-Sweet Blast
description:
Cake Pop-Sweet Blast is built for match 3 game lovers to start a cake exploration adventure. Try to create explosive combos via group at least 4 same cakes in a row to get the magical boosters. Collect breads and cakes for the preparation of tricky levels. Join the cool cake game to become the cake champion of sweet matching world!
Features:
- Hundreds of tasty cake filled levels with more added frequently
- Uniquely interesting obstacles like ice floor, fluffy ball, cookie, candy bar, etc.
- Create amazing power-ups to clear the screen
- Wonderful animation explosive effects
- Explore the new world of incredible flavors
